title: Bandbox, ca. 1831–40
medium: Block-printed on handmade paper, pasteboard support
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Blue field. Napolean and French soldier being challenged by a soldier with a musket. Printed in dull pink and olive, with white decoration.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bandbox, ca. 1831–40.
ca. 1831–40. Block-printed on handmade paper, pasteboard support. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1913-17-9-a,b.
